Html:
Excellent work..  This is one of the best way to work using offline maps.

Where can I find some sample code or a documentation for the following requirement I am trying to implement.

I have lat longs of a bounding box in the back end. I have to load the maps within that bounding box down for every zoom levels and load it in the gmbd db. And make the Windows mobile version of our code to look in the db file and work in AccessMode.CacheOnly mode.

-> http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets

there are demos for desktop and mobile, you can pre-cache your area using demos
